channel.title: How to make a item unspawnable / only admins can wear it [525]
channel.description:
Hi I have two questions 1. Since I have a spawning server [525] how do I make an item unspawnable? 2. How do I set it so only admins can wear the item?
*REMEMBER I AM USING A 525 SPAWNING SOURCE* PLEASE REPLY ANYONE..... REALLY NEED THIS FOR MY SERVER
